name: Jungle Man
summary:
The Most Challenging Game on Quest!
Get good or die trying. Never before has a game like this been available in MR. Turn your home into a vine-swinging obstacle course in Jungle Man—a fast, funny, and totally chaotic action-puzzler. Made exclusively for mixed reality on Meta Quest 3/3s. No controllers needed. We've perfected hand tracking.

{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}

*Jungle Man requires a minimum playspace of (3x4m/10x13ft).

Hand Tracking Madness!
